name: Angel Devagi Prabhakaran Foundation
briefDescription: To establish, promote, set-up, run, maintain, assist, finance support and / or aid to or help in the setting up and / or maintaining and / or running schools, Engineering, Arts and Science colleges, take over and manage Technical institutions, Imparting formal, Non-formal and Adult education including Vocational training in various Skills and Craftwmanship for the beneffit of its beneiciaries and other insttitutions, orphanages, Widow homes, Lunatic asylums, Creche, Destitute homes, Home for the aged and Hostel, Day-care center to benefit infants and aged people or other establishemts for relief and / or help to the poor, old and infirm people and / or destitute.
